meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #704.

td.p: Brian Lipson, a student from Woodland Hills, California
Eileen Harrsch, a geologist from Denver, Colorado
Heywood Sobel, an engineer from Mar Vista, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $4,000)

tr.td: U.S. CITIES
OXYMORONS
SURVEY SAYS
NETWORK BRASS
BIBLICAL QUOTES
"NU" WORDS
